message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that's worth a lot to you. I'm asking for $115 for it.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer but $90 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $105. This is still a good deal for you, considering the product's value to you. Let's work this out!
I'm not sure I can go as high as $105. I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal, and I'm willing to work with you.  I'm going to come down to $100, which is still a good price for you.  Let's close this deal!
I'm getting close to your price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $92.50. Can you meet me there?
